hassio_confirm.description: Do you want to configure Home Assistant to connect to the AdGuard Home provided by the add-on: {addon}?
hassio_confirm.title: AdGuard Home via Home Assistant add-on

data_description.host: The hostname or IP address of the device running your AdGuard Home.

user.description: Set up your AdGuard Home instance to allow monitoring and control.

add_url.description: Add a new filter subscription to AdGuard Home.

name.description: The name of the filter subscription.
name.name: Name

url.description: The filter URL to subscribe to, containing the filter rules.
url.name: URL

add_url.name: Add URL

disable_url.description: Disables a filter subscription in AdGuard Home.

url.description: The filter subscription URL to disable.
url.name: URL

disable_url.name: Disable URL

enable_url.description: Enables a filter subscription in AdGuard Home.

url.description: The filter subscription URL to enable.
url.name: URL

enable_url.name: Enable URL

refresh.description: Refresh all filter subscriptions in AdGuard Home.

force.description: Force update (bypasses AdGuard Home throttling). "true" to force, or "false" to omit for a regular refresh.
force.name: Force

refresh.name: Refresh

remove_url.description: Removes a filter subscription from AdGuard Home.

url.description: The filter subscription URL to remove.
url.name: URL

remove_url.name: Remove URL
